contentrichtext.text: '''Hov''' can refer to the following: ==Places== *[[Hov, Faroe Islands]], a village located on the island of Suðuroy in the Faroe Islands *[[Hov, Buskerud]], a village in Hurum municipality in Buskerud county, Norway *[[Hov, Norway]], the administrative centre of Søndre Land municipality, in Oppland county, Norway *[[Hov Church]], a church in Sunndalsøra in Sunndal municipality, Møre og Romsdal county, Norway *[[Hov Church (Oppland)]], a church in Søndre Land municipality, Buskerud county, Norway *A hov or [[Heathen_hofs|hof]] is an old Germanic religious structure ==People== *Rapper [[Jay-Z]], based on a shortened version of his alternate name JayHOVa ==Abbreviations== *HOV, a [[High-occupancy vehicle]] *HOV, the ticker symbol for the U.S. homebuilding company: [[Hovnanian Enterprises]] *HOV, a Hospital Outpatient Visit *HOV, a Human Occupied Vehicle (for remotely operated vehicles, see [[Remotely operated underwater vehicle|ROV]]) {{disambig}}
